item.description:
Let's talk. One on one business opportunity meeting. Let me know what you are doing today, where you want to be, and then see what I have to offer you. After we talk, you can either join my global team and become independent or you walk away and the cafe is on me.
PLEASE ATTEND IF YOU ARE SERIOUS ABOUT BUSINESS - NO LAZY PEOPLE PLEASE
item.how_to_find_us: I will meet you there and provide my mobile number.
item.name: ONE ON ONE - BUSINESS OPPORTUNITY TALK
